New Records: The Kansas City Royals secured their first playoff berth since 2015 by clinching the American League wild card with a 3-0 shutout of the Atlanta Braves on September 27, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals had a strong offseason with key signings and trades, turning their season around from their poor 56-106 performance in 2023.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals joined an extremely rare group in baseball history by making the playoffs after losing over 100 games in the previous season.
